newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Regulatory delays increase risk - North.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Regulatory delays increase risk - North.

text.p: Delays surrounding native title applications and uncertainties over regulatory approvals had increased the level of soverign risk for resource developments in Australia, North Ltd chairman Michael Deeley said Thursday.
Deeley told the annual general meeting of the mining and forestry group that North had been forced to seek opportunities in countries where the regulatory enviroment was more supportive.
He said 55 percent of North's exploration efforts were now directed overseas while the average for the Australian industry was 37 percent.
"It will be many years before the full economic impact on this nation of this trend is felt," Deeley said.
"Those responsible for regulatory matters should be aware of their economic impact," he said.
